synopsis.text: In the year 200X, World War III left parts of Tokyo in ruins, creating an isolated area known as the Black Spot. Decades later, residents of the Black Spot called Needless developed strange powers like pyrokinesis and telekinesis. They are hunted by Simeon, a pharmaceutical company seeking to exploit the Needless. Young Cruz joins a resistance against Simeon, led by the powerful Needless Adam Arclight. After Simeon kills the resistance, Cruz is saved by new allies - Professor Gido, Eve, and Blade. Together, they fight back against Simeon attacks to uncover why the corporation desperately seeks mysterious Fragments.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
